programme.title: Game Night
programme.desc: Comedy mystery starring Jason Bateman and Rachel McAdams. An extremely competitive, board game-loving couple get to test their skills when one of their group is "kidnapped" during an interactive role-play. After solving the first round of clues, Max and Annie realise that the abduction was, in fact, a real one and they may be in danger John Francis Daley - Director Jonathan Goldstein - Director Jason Bateman - Max Rachel McAdams - Annie Billy Magnussen - Ryan Sharon Horgan - Sarah Lamorne Morris - Kevin Jesse Plemons - Gary Danny Huston - Donald Anderton Chelsea Peretti - Glenda Michael C Hall - The Bulgarian Kyle Chandler - Brooks Joshua Mikel - Colin Jason Bateman - Max Rachel McAdams - Annie Billy Magnussen - Ryan Sharon Horgan - Sarah Lamorne Morris - Kevin Jesse Plemons - Gary Danny Huston - Donald Anderton Chelsea Peretti - Glenda Michael C Hall - The Bulgarian Kyle Chandler - Brooks Joshua Mikel - Colin.

programme.title: Blue Beetle
programme.sub-title: Action, Sci Fi, Thriller, Fantasy, Drama ║ 2023 ║ 12A
programme.desc: An ancient relic of alien biotechnology known as the Scarab chooses college graduate Jaime Reyes as its symbiotic host. He is transformed into the superhero Blue Beetle, who is protected by a suit of armour. However, powerful businesswoman Victoria Kord will stop at nothing to acquire the Scarab. programme.title: No Hard Feelings
programme.desc: Faced with the possibility of losing her mother's house, a woman called Maddie answers an advert from a married couple, who are offering a Buick Regal car to anyone willing to 'date' their introverted 19-year-old son Percy before he attends college. Maddie promises to bring the teenager out of his shell. programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.sub-title: Action, Animation, Comedy, Fantasy, Children's, Family, Drama ║ 2008 ║ PG
programme.desc: Animated adventure featuring the voices of Jack Black, Dustin Hoffman and Angelina Jolie. Ancient China: Po the Panda lives in the Valley of Peace and dreams of becoming a kung fu master despite the fact he is clumsy, overweight and a complete beginner at martial arts. So when he's accidentally chosen to be the legendary Dragon Warrior, he is overjoyed. However, his joy is short-lived as the evil snow leopard Tai Lung has escaped from captivity and is on his way to the Valley to take his revenge on Po's mentor Mark Osborne - Director John Stevenson - Director Jack Black - Po Dustin Hoffman - Master Shifu Angelina Jolie - Tigress Ian McShane - Tai Lung Jackie Chan - Monkey Seth Rogen - Mantis Lucy Liu - Viper David Cross (2) - Crane Michael Clarke Duncan - Commander Vachir Jack Black - Po Dustin Hoffman - Master Shifu Angelina Jolie - Tigress Ian McShane - Tai Lung Jackie Chan - Monkey Seth Rogen - Mantis Lucy Liu - Viper David Cross (2) - Crane Michael Clarke Duncan - Commander Vachir.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Arts And Culture, Musical, Drama ║ 2024 ║ 12A
programme.desc: High school outcasts Janis Sarkisian and Damian Hubbard narrate the tale of 15-year-old Cady Heron, who moves back to America from Kenya with her mother. Janis encourages Cady to infiltrate the Plastics, ruled by the formidable Regina George, but when she does, the clique soon corrupts the new girl. programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Anthony Hopkins and Johnny Flynn. In 1938, young British stockbroker Nicholas Winton visits Prague and becomes involved in an audacious plan to evacuate hundreds of Jewish children before the Nazis close the borders. programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: Wartime comedy starring George Clooney, Ewan McGregor, Jeff Bridges and Kevin Spacey. While scratching around Kuwait in search of a story about the Iraq war, reporter Bob Wilton meets Lyn Cassady, who claims to be a member of an experimental military unit that uses psychic powers to read the enemy's thoughts, can pass through solid walls and even kill a goat by staring at it. programme.title: The Independent
programme.desc: During the final weeks of the most consequential presidential election campaign in US history, America is poised to elect either its first female president or finally break the country's two-party gridlock with its first viable independent candidate. An idealistic young journalist gets an opportunity to work with her idol, veteran Washington political columnist Nick Booker. Eli is pursuing a story about budget cuts and by following the money, she and Booker uncover a financial conspiracy that places the fate of the election, the country, and democracy in their hands. programme.title: Lee
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Kate Winslet. As the Second World War rages, American fashion model-turned-photographer Elizabeth "Lee" Miller defies the expectations of the era and travels to mainland Europe as a war correspondent for Vogue. programme.title: Fight Night Int
programme.desc: In what is his toughest test yet, Olympic silver medallist Keyshawn Davis makes his homecoming with a lightweight bout against 28-year-old Gustavo Lemos of Buenos Aires. (09.11).

programme.title: Sao Paulo F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: It's lights out at Interlagos in Sao Paulo. A fifth pole in seven races sees Lando Norris lead alongside George Russell on the front row, while Yuki Tsunoda completes the top three. (03.11).

programme.title: Grand Slam Of Darts Final
programme.desc: At the 2024 Grand Slam of Darts in Wolverhampton, a champion is crowned in the final as teenager Luke Littler and Martin Lukeman compete for the coveted Eric Bristow Trophy. (17.11).

programme.title: NFL: Ravens @ Steelers Hlts
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights from a match-up during week 11 of the 2024 NFL regular season as Mike Tomlin's AFC North-leading Pittsburgh Steelers host division rival, Lamar Jackson's Ravens. (17.11).

programme.title: ATP Vienna: Draper v Khachanov
programme.desc: British number one Jack Draper competes in his first ATP 500 final, as the US Open semi-finalist will take on Karen Khachanov for the Erste Bank Open trophy in Vienna. (27.10).

programme.title: WTA Final: San Diego
programme.desc: British number one Katie Boulter looks to win her first WTA 500 title as she takes on Marta Kostyuk in the final of the San Diego Open. Kostyuk knocked out the top seed to get here. (03.03).

programme.title: NFL: Ravens @ Steelers Hlts
programme.desc: The AFC North-leading Pittsburgh Steelers aim to extend their four-game winning streak as Mike Tomlin's side host division rival, Lamar Jackson's Baltimore Ravens. (17.11).

programme.title: Wk11 SNF: 1hr
programme.desc: In a strong position to reach the postseason, the 6-3 Los Angeles Chargers host a playoff-contending outfit in the form of Joe Burrow's Cincinnati Bengals during week 11 of the NFL. (17.11).

programme.title: WBBL: Perth S v Hobart H Hlts
programme.desc: Perth Scorchers and Hobart Hurricanes collide in the WBBL. (23.11).

programme.title: LIVE: WBBL: Brisbane H v Sydney S
programme.desc: Brisbane Heat and Sydney Sixers compete in the WBBL. (24.11).

programme.title: WBBL: Melbourne R v Sydney T Hlts
programme.desc: Melbourne Renegades take on Sydney Thunder in the WBBL. (22.11).

programme.title: WBBL:Brisbane H v Melbourne S Hlts
programme.desc: Brisbane Heat face Melbourne Stars in the WBBL. (22.11).

programme.title: Bundesliga Legends: Frank Ribery
programme.desc: One of the defining figures of an era in Bavaria, Franck Ribery was no stranger to a goal or two. Revisit a selection of the enchanting Frenchman's finest strikes.

programme.title: LIVE: B'Liga: Holstein Kiel v Mainz
programme.desc: A German Bundesliga clash pitting Holstein Kiel up against Mainz. (24.11).

programme.title: Spirit of Yachting
programme.desc: Revisit the 2024 edition of the Mediterranean's most famous 600-mile offshore race.

programme.title: Australian PGA Championship Hlts
programme.desc: The fourth day of the BMW Australian PGA Championship, held at Royal Queensland Golf Club. This event forms part of the DP World Tour's Opening Swing in the southern hemisphere. (24.11).

programme.title: LIVE: NFL Red Zone Week 12
programme.desc: Follow the full story from a packed Sunday of action in the National Football League with all the key moments, live stats, analysis and more.

programme.title: Las Vegas F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: It's lights out at the Las Vegas Grand Prix. Set against one of the most vibrant backdrops F1 has ever seen, it was Max Verstappen who lit up the Strip with last year's race win. (23.11).

programme.title: WBBL:Melbourne S v Adelaide S Hlts
programme.desc: Melbourne Stars play host to Adelaide Strikers in the WBBL. (23.11).

programme.title: WBBL: Brisbane H v Sydney S Hlts

programme.title: Fight Night Int
programme.desc: ...v Foster. Robson Conceicao defends the WBC super featherweight title as Brazil's first Olympic boxing gold medallist meets the man he controversially dethroned, O'Shaquie Foster. (03.11).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Ryan v Mayer
programme.desc: After a four-fight run on British soil, Mikaela Mayer returns to the US looking to become a two-weight world champion as she faces Sandy Ryan for the WBO welterweight world title. (28.09).

programme.title: ICC Men's T20 WC SF 1 Hlts
programme.desc: History makers Afghanistan get the knockout stage of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup underway, as Rashid Khan and Co attempt to topple the unbeaten South Africa for a spot in the final. (27.06).

programme.title: ICC Men's T20 WC SF 2 Hlts
programme.desc: The stage is set in Guyana for a semi-final showdown between undefeated India and reigning champions England. Who will book their ticket to the final of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup? (27.06).

programme.title: ICC Men's T20 WC Final Hlts
programme.desc: After crushing the holders in the semi-finals, a rampant India are rewarded with an ICC Men's T20 World Cup final meeting against fellow unbeaten nation South Africa in Barbados. (29.06).

programme.desc: The NFC-leading Detroit Lions travel to the Indianapolis Colts for a week 12 contest in the NFL. The Lions improved to 9-1 last week after a lopsided 52-6 win over the Jaguars. (24.11).
